name: Interzombellar
description:
You find yourself dead and zombified. This is the end. Or is it? 

Search graves for spare body parts. Reveal history of residents of this cemetery. Don't hurry, you have nothing to live for anymore.. yet.

Game is beaten when you find a brain. And so your life is fulfilled.

Use WASD to move and your mouse to interact with environment.

  • Source: https://gitlab.com/kitaetc4/jam-gdtv-2022 
  • Zombie Sprites: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/2d-zombie-free-sprite
  • Dialogue System: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/dialogue-editor-168329
  • Environment Art - DIY
  • Music - DIY
